title: Vector Formulas
formulas: \begin{bmatrix}a & b & c\\d & e & f\\g & h & i\end{bmatrix} = a\begin{bmatrix}e & f\\h & i\end{bmatrix} - b\begin{bmatrix}d & f\\g & i\end{bmatrix} + c\begin{bmatrix}d & e\\g & h\end{bmatrix}
\vec{a} \times \vec{b} = \begin{bmatrix}i & j & k\\a_1 & a_2 & a_3\\b_1 & b_2 & b_3\end{bmatrix} = i(a_2b_3 - a_3b_2) - j(a_1b_3 - a_3b_1) + k(a_1b_2 - a_2b_1)
